report.description: This report gives a summary for an OMer of all the gifts they have received in a particular year, listing each donor and their monthly giving. However, if gifts are confidential, the donor name and key are not displayed. TODO: Show confidential gifts if the user has FINANCE-2 access or greater.

queryDetail.value: SELECT DISTINCT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS RecipientKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c FROM PUB_p_partner, PUB_a_gift_detail, PUB_a_gift_batch, PUB_a_gift

, PUB_m_extract, PUB_m_extract_master WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_m_extract.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_m_extract.m_extract_id_i = PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_id_i AND PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_name_c = {param_extract_name} AND
SELECT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS RecipientName, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_class_c AS RecipientClass FROM PUB_p_partner WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = {{RecipientKey}}
SELECT DISTINCT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS DonorKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS DonorName, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_class_c AS DonorClass,
SUM (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS Total, COUNT (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS TotalCount
SUM (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_intl_n) AS Total, COUNT (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS TotalCount
SELECT COUNT (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS TotalCount, SUM (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS YearTotal
SELECT COUNT (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS TotalCount, SUM (PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS YearTotal
